markdownRemark.html:
Hoaman is non-profit research company. Our mission is to reinvent the intelligence and make it accessible to everyone. To make it possible, We are making the organisation non-profit so we can take unbiased decisions.

Invention

Technology has been always designed to make our lives better. So many research has been done so far but only few of them has a great impact on our day to day lives.

As a human being, We alredy did invented so many inventions. In last couple of decades, We really had achieved fastest possible growth in technology. However, When it comes to the automation of a smallest possible task, It requires huge amount of effort.

The problem is that everthing is designed or invented to make easy for human mind but It could be very difficult to understand for the mind humans had created.

We need to reinvent whatever we did so far to make it easy for machines to understand and also make it feasible for everyone ot use.

Reinvention

Technology have great impact on our lives but it has narrow scope of automation. Our mission is to reinvent the intelligence the way that could achive human intelligence and more than that to help the society.

Hoaman

It is really hard to change the fundamental but It is required to change the fundamental to achieve machine intelligence which can make impact on lives of everyone. It is also important to understand from where to start and what outcome without getting biased with monetization of it.

We are taking steps ahead to grow as such kind of organisation. Our goal is to create value for everyone. We will collabrately work with the academia, companies and institutions to research and deploy new technologies.
